author: Penny Yi
comment: Overall, one of the best designs I've seen. Very sleek, and functional. Ambient colors and design could be improved, but overall awesome face. I have problems on my Moto 360 2nd gen, where trying to close a secondary screen (like options or weather), I have to tap just above the "X" icon to close. Tapping the actual close button does nothing. Please look into this.
title: Great design, small flaws.

author: Raj Soni
comment: Probably the best watch face I've come across to date. Great if we could see more watch faces from VizorWatch with the calender notifications included around the clock and more visual features such as an RSS feed scroll somewhere on the watch face and more animation features.
title: Functional & Great looking

author: Jason Hiltabidel
comment: This is by far my favorite watch face. It looks great and adds a lot of cool functionality.
title: Beautiful and functional

author: Sam King
comment: The watch looks great, sunset and Sunrise would be a nice add. I also feel like my watch battery drains faster while using this watch. My thoughts, still deserve 5* for nice design

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello, Sam. Normal battery drain should be located within 2.5-4% per hour. If your device runs out of power quickly, try to restart it and your phone. I am currently working on optimizing this dial. In addition, frequent switching screens and use additional features can greatly accelerate battery drain.

title: Nice design

author: Jim Thibodeau
comment: In the description it states 12/24 hour time but it will cost you to change it.  The temp is centigrade only.  I can't use it as it is. 12/30/15 Thank you for the info to change C to F. I just re-read the description and on my copy it does state: "12 time, 24 Time, Battery level....."

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content:
Hello. You can switch Celsius to Fahrenheit in WatchMaker settings.

UPD: Jim, you mean the description under "Features" in WatchMaker? The program automatically generates this description, based on the widgets used. Alas, I cannot edit this description.

comment: Looks like a cool face, but when I download it it doesn't show up anywhere on my watch or phone.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello. This watch face is designed to work with the program WatchMaker. This is described in detail in the description for this face.

title: Can't find it

comment: Not installing in my xiomi redme note 4

comment: Nice, but delay

comment: Functional. Beautiful. Neat. Lots of information without cluttering the face. Simply brilliant.

comment: Love the design. with all functions at your fingertips.

author: Ivan Yakut
comment: Cool

author: Alex Piggott
comment: ... On my moto at least, the ambient display is way too hard to see. If it could either show a larger version of the digital display ("pujie style") in dimmed, or just better contrast with the analog hands it would be perfect (and I'd shell for the premium version, eh which I might do anyway!)

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello! Thanks for the feedback! Yes, I know about this problem for some types of screens. However, this free version will no longer be updated. All further changes, fixes and improvements will be made only in the paid version of this watch face. Updates will be available during the week or a bit earlier.

title: One of the best "daily driver" watch faces I've seen, except...

author: Matt Wells
comment: Edit: bought the paid version.      I saw the post for this on G+ so thought why not, it's free.  This thing is absolutely stunning. Where's the "buy me a beer" link? The weather, calendar I simply can't say enough about it.  Simply fantastic.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Thank you so much for such a flattering review! If you terribly want to buy me a beer, you can try the paid version of this watch face. ))) Noticeable and important differences there are still lacking, except for a small amount of money on beer. ) : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vizor.wmwatch.metal.black.blue

title: Fantastic, simply fantastic

author: Shaun Slade
comment: I've been looking around and swapping faces a lot then I found this. It has everything I need onscreen. My favourite so far.
title: Gorgeous

author: James Hablewitz
comment: The look and functions of this is extremely neat. Possibly my my new favorite watch face.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Thank you so much for such a flattering review!

title: So cool!!!

comment: Very useful with awesome design and interface.

reply.author: VizorWatch
reply.content: Hello! Thank you! Fahrenheit can be selected in the WatchMacker program settings
